Articles.Content:
In 0.17 update one of many things will be coming out. Like the new IVA's, and the new planets! Now ive only gathered so much information that i cant put it all out in this thread. So i am just going to put a few pictures i have and show u guys what to expect of these new planets. (this thread is probably not 100% correct so dont take all my word for it.)

Planets: Charr, Eve, Kerbin, Murs, Green gas gaint.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32016[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32017[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32018[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32019[/ATTACH]

I took out that link to one of Nova's threads because it was old and ancient i never new

You can also see more pictures of these awsome new planets in this link to Nova's profile. Go there and look at his pics. :http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/member.php/3898-NovaSilisko

Edited August 29, 2012 by cocomoe1002
Took out link
Great, finally a semi-collection of links and info not spread out over 100 pages.
Those planets mentioned by Nova aren't the actual planets and moons in the next update. If you looked at my blog you would of seen all the info currently released on the planets.
Wait, has the solar system been changed?

Wait, has the solar system been changed?

You linked to a post Nova did over a year ago before he worked for Squad. (afaik)

So yes, some of that is very ancient information that has changed.

Oh I see, he linked to nova's hypothetical solar system guide.

On that note, question! Will the ocean moon have an atmosphere? Because if not... that makes no sense.
Too bad docking won't be released yet. Unless it's a surprise feature...? Anyways, awesome job on the planets.
